extendedInfo.description: Cool Soccer GoalsThis is an awesome soccer version game that will help you make the best out of your spare time. Don't waste your sacred and important extra minutes playing trashy games.  The arcade soccer game gives you ten chances to make a GOAL! Main Features- Leaderboards- Cool Sound Effects- Awesome graphics! by Fipiono AsprillaUse all your skills to make 10/10 goals and if you achieve it you will get an amazing BONUS to your score.Your success depends on the speed of the "swipe" or "flick", orientation and location. Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. We may also send you some notification that you can always elect not to see them again. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!
